description: Master the art of focus and timing to break solid wood, stone, and ice blocks.
rationale: This game focuses on high-precision timing and reaction speed, a core mechanic found in classic arcade bonus stages like Street Fighter. It serves as an excellent environment for Reinforcement Learning agents to learn optimal action timing relative to a moving gauge.
details: The player controls a martial artist standing in front of a stack of materials. A vertical power gauge oscillates rapidly between 0 and 100. The center of the gauge (the 'sweet spot') is marked as the target. The player must trigger the 'strike' action when the gauge reaches the designated high-power zone. Success depends on the proximity to the peak value. Materials progress from thin wood to thick stone, then solid ice, each requiring a smaller timing window and higher power threshold.

game_mechanics.target_zone: A specific range (e.g., 90-100) on the 0-100 scale.
game_mechanics.progression: Successful breaks lead to harder materials and faster moving bars.

technical_specs.state_space: Current gauge position, target zone bounds, material type, speed.

how_to_build: uv venv && uv pip install pygame
how_to_play: Watch the moving gauge on the right side of the screen. Press the 'SPACE' key when the slider is inside the red target zone at the top. Breaking a block grants 100 points plus a bonus based on how close you were to the maximum value (100). If you miss the zone, the block remains intact and you lose one life.
